comment.author: Mackenzie
comment.text: Donald will you help Vets like me who can't get proper care from the VA??

replies.author: Mackenzie
replies.text: Rachel G. took 4 years to get an ortho appointment for my service connected knee and that's not even the worst part.

replies.author: Tessa
replies.text: Prayers for you Mackenzie It is the great Vets like you why I'm pushing TRUMP so much! I respect and thank you sir for your commentment to Americas Freedom! Wear non political RED shirts to the polls!!
